Package index

All functions

column_diffs()
Calculate column differences
mask_micro_summary()
Mask micro data in gtsummary::tbl_summary() tables
mask_micro_table()
Mask across tibble by column differences
masking()
Two-dimensional micro data masking to handle binary and nominal data
minimal_mask()
Small function to mask minimally
rounded_interval()
Create interval with value rounded down and up to nearest number specified
summary_masks()
Implementation step for masking
